column8: | other:Jason Aaron | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | penciller:Ron Garney | colorist:Jason Keith | artist:Ed McGuinness
column16: Captain America meets his ultimate nemesis-the Captain America of the Vietnam War!  As new enemies face off, old secrets from the super soldier project are revealed. From the superstar Wolverine: Weapon X creative team of Jason Aaron and Ron Garney, get ready for a hard hitting story of one man's quest to serve his country...and the sacrifices he must make.
